data.title: 'Rock' Dwayne Johnson to feature in UFC MMA film 'The Smashing Machine'
data.meta_description: "The Smashing Machine" starring Dwayne Johnson to release in 2025. The movie will have ‘Rock play the character of Mark Kerr who in real life is an MMA champion and UFC superstar.
data.text:
Synopsis

"The Smashing Machine" starring Dwayne Johnson to release in 2025. The movie will have ‘Rock’ play the character of Mark Kerr who in real life is an MMA champion and UFC superstar.

In a new video that has been released, Dwayne Johnson has been seen practicing in a ring. This is in the upcoming movie “The Smashing Machine”. The report by Screen Rant also mentions that the movie will be directed by Benny Safdie.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Budget Highlights: Your 2-minute guide

FM 's plan for Viksit Bharat: A look at key numbers

What's in Sitharaman's Budget for you?

How many of us remember ‘Rock’ from the old WWE days? The wrestling champion who could bring down opponents easily. Dwayne Johnson whose ring name is ‘Rock’ plays the character of Mark Kerr in this movie.

The actor has shared some photos and videos of his MMA practice. While he may have been a champion wrester, this is a different ring game all together.

Storyline:

The production of the movie is yet to begin but we do have glimpses of the storyline of the movie. This movie is all about Mark Kerr who is an MMA champion. The movie outlines his rise as an MMA champion and all his professional and personal challenges. The is based on a true story of Mark Kerr.

Mark Kerr in real life has been a professional boxer and MMA artist.

Here is the link to the video posted by Dwayne Johnson:

Cast:

* Dwayne Johnson plays the character of Mark Kerr

* Emily Blunt may play the character of Dawn Staples

* Lyndsey Gavin plays the character of Elizabeth Coleman

Writers include Benny Safdie.

Release Date:

The movie is expected to release sometime in 2025.

Who is Mark Kerr?

He is a former MMA artist and a world champion. He was forced to quit the world of MMA due to his drug addiction, as he mentioned in several interviews. According to news reports, he is now the owner of a flooring company.

FAQs:

Q1. Which University did Mark Kerr go to?

A1. He went to Syracuse university where he excelled in MMA. After his university, he got into professional MMA.

Q2. Apart from “The Smashing Machine” which movie has Benny Safdie directed?

A2. He has directed Heaven Knows What and Good Times among others. He has also directed the critically acclaimed Oppenheimer.
